%******************************************************************************************************************%
% This synthesis dataset is generated by VehicleX, which is a publicly aviablable 3D engine.                       %
% A total of 1,362 vehicles are annotated with detailed labels.                                                    %
% There are 113,346 images for VechileID. Our code is available at https://github.com/yorkeyao/VehicleX            %
%******************************************************************************************************************%

Content in the directory:
1. "VID_ReID_Simulation/". This dir contains 113,346 images for training. 
2. "train_label.xml". It lists the detailed labels for training. Lighting and camera labels are Unity parameters.

If you have any question, please contact yue.yao@anu.edu.au
